picks.explanation: The Titans need a franchise quarterback and Beck's accuracy and decision-making make him the perfect fit.
The Browns need to bolster their pass rush and Pearce's explosiveness off the edge is exactly what they need.
The Giants need a new face of the franchise and Sanders' dual-threat ability and leadership make him an ideal choice.
The Patriots need a true WR1 and Burden's route-running and playmaking ability would transform their offense.
